subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Ichiro Suzuki trade, potentially a victory for both teams, illustrates a recent tradition: if there is a famous player on an also-ran team, count on the Yankees to get him.
snippet: The Ichiro Suzuki trade, potentially a victory for both teams, illustrates a recent tradition: if there is a famous player on an also-ran team, count on the Yankees to get him.
